import React from'react';import'../App.css';import Header from'../component/Header';import RESULT from'../content/RESULT';import Final_TYPE from'../content/FinalTYPE';import NextButton from'../component/NextButton';import QNA from'../content/QNA';import{ComposedChart,XAxis,YAxis,Tooltip,Legend,CartesianGrid,Area,Line}from'recharts';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Result=RESULT;var Final_Type=Final_TYPE;function Final_Result(props){var Res=props.location.state.Res;console.log(Res);//Set Period Value - Q1

var Pur2=0;//-> Pur2 value
var tmp_pur=[];//-> 값 보관함
